Package game

Class Stage

java.lang.Object
game.Stage
public class Stage
extends java.lang.Object
A Stage class that contains all stage entities and makes them act
Author:
ayu663

    Constructs a stage with stage number stageNum, top left corner x, y, and dimensions width*height.

  • Constructor Details

    • Stage

      public Stage​(int stageNum, int x, int y, int width, int height, Player p)
      Constructs a stage with stage number stageNum, top left corner x, y, and dimensions width*height.
      Parameters:
      stageNum - the stage to construct (1-4)
      x - topLeft x of the stage
      y - topLeft y of the stage
      width - width of the stage
      height - height of the stage
      p - player passed into the stage and to interact there

  • Method Details

    • setup

      public void setup​(processing.core.PApplet surface)
      Sets up the stage with an image using Processing
      Parameters:
      surface - PApplet to setup with

    • draw

      public void draw​(processing.core.PApplet surface)
      Will visually draw and update the current frame of the Stage elements, and the getStatistics
      Parameters:
      surface - PApplet surface to draw on

    • getStats

      public Statistics getStats()
      Returns a Statistics object used for drawing outside of the class
      Returns:
      Statistics The statistics for this Player

    • giveInputs

      public void giveInputs​(DrawingSurface surface, int gameNum)
      Forward inputs into the player for movement and skill activation
      Parameters:
      surface - Surface to draw on
      gameNum - The game number

    • isCompleted

      public boolean isCompleted()
      Returns:
      True if all enemies died, false otherwise

    • gameOver

      public boolean gameOver()
      Returns:
      True if the game is over, false otherwise
